author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Department of Posts issued a special cover on Monday on the Mahamaham 2016 celebrations with a special cancellation depicting the sacred tank, its hallowed wells and mandapams.

The City Union Bank, headquartered in Kumbakonam, sponsored another special cover and cancellation to mark the occasion with its 112 years of service with tradition and technology.

Special Meghdoot Post Card for a value of 25 paise to commemorate the occasion with a picture of the Mahamaham tank was also released on the occasion.

Collector N. Subbaiyan released the special covers and the cancellations in the presence of Superintendent of Police N.M. Mayilvahanan, Kumbakonam Sub Collector M. Govinda Rao, Chief Post Master General S.K. Swain, City Union Bank Managing Director N. Kamakoti, Chairman S. Balasubramanian, Chief Project Officer S. Balasubramaniam and Municipal Chairperson Rathna Sekar.

During the day, Ms. Rathna Sekar visited the Mahamaham tank, Portramarai Tank and Chakra Padithurai and enquired the pilgrims about the facilities and arrangements made for them.

When they told her about the need for drinking water on the tank bunds, she directed installation of some tanks to provide water in those spots.

Pilgrims could dial 95660 58888 to inform the civic authorities on needs and complaints, she said and added that prompt action would follow the calls.

Annadhanam

Though a total of 30 individuals and institutions petitioned the district administration for extending annadhanam during the Mahamaham festivities, officials have given green signal so far to six applicants.

They are Sastra University, City Union Bank, Kanchi Sankara Mutt, Thiruvannamalai Trust, Koranattu Karuppur Meenakshi Sundareswarar temple and another individual on the Korkai Road.
title: Special postal cover issued
